column1: #Text=Polycrystalline ceramics were prepared by the solidstate synthesis procedure.
#Text=La2O3, Fe2O3, and MoO3 powders were thoroughly mixed
#Text=and the obtained fine powder was subsequently annealed at
#Text=1200 ˚C in a 99% Ar/1%H2 gas for 12 h and cooled to room
#Text=II) was used to check the phase integrity for any impurities.
#Text=Finally, the powder was pressed to 5 GPa to form a 5-mmdiameter pellet and subsequently sintered for 6 h at 1200 ˚C
